author: Drew Scofield
title: Ohio National Guard providing Ukraine with armored vehicles for war against Russia

sentence: VW independent staff and submitted information COLUMBUS — Governor Mike DeWine announced on Tuesday that the Ohio Army National Guard will aid Ukraine by providing armored personnel carriers for use against continued Russian aggression.
title: Ohio Nat’l Guard sending aid to Ukraine

author: Daniel Griffin
title: Ohio National Guard to provide armored carriers to Ukraine

sentence: OHIO, USA — Ohio Governor Mike DeWine is extending Ohio resources to military members in Ukraine.
author: WKYC Staff
title: Ohio National Guard to provide support to Ukraine

sentence: For the Miami Valley Today COLUMBUS — Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced this week that the Ohio Army National Guard will aid Ukraine by providing armored personnel carriers for use against continued Russian aggression.
author: Staff Reports
title: Ohio National Guard provides support to Ukraine

sentence: COLUMBUS— Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced today that the Ohio Army National Guard will aid Ukraine by providing armored personnel carriers for use against continued Russian aggression.

title: Ohio National Guard provides support to Ukraine
